Customer Concern: Range dropping significantly - only getting 180 miles
Work Performed: Battery diagnostic performed - cells showing degradation. Replaced battery pack

Customer Concern: Screen black again - same issue as before
Work Performed: Software reflash and MCU replacement under warranty
